MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the EH14 postcode area of Currie. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 1:00pm  to safely carry out repairs to street lighting fault and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:13pm on Wednesday, 07 April 2021
